name: A pure walking sim
description:
This week I wanted to do David Wehle's seven day course/challenge, and make a walking simulator. I only managed to create a small demo with first person walking and ambience, but rules are rules - it's the end of the week, so I have to upload it. Enjoy a walk in a low poly park.

I used sound "Exterior Ambiences Spring, Suburban Quebec, Canada" by mitchellsounds, from freesounds.
